data.title: Ron Silver
data.text:
AKA Ron Zimelman

Born: 2-Jul-1946

Birthplace: New York City

Died: 15-Mar-2009

Location of death: New York City

Cause of death: Cancer - other

Gender: Male

Religion: Jewish

Race or Ethnicity: White

Sexual orientation: Straight

Occupation: Actor

Party Affiliation: Independent

Nationality: United States

Executive summary: Wiseguy

Father: Irving Roy Silver

Mother: May Zimelman

Wife: Lynne Miller (m. 24-Dec-1975, div. 1997)

High School: Stuyvesant High School, New York City, NY (1963)

University: BA Spanish and Chinese, SUNY Buffalo

University: MA Chinese History, St. John's University, Queens NY (1970)

University: College of Chinese Culture, Taiwan

Actors' Equity Association President (1991-2000)

The Creative Coalition President (1989-93)

Israel Project Board of Advisors

Libby Legal Defense Trust Advisory Committee

Woodrow Wilson International Center for Scholars Wilson Council

Sigma Alpha Mu Fraternity

Tony 1988 for Speed-the-Plow

Draft Deferment: Vietnam
